name: LorettaRestrains
restraintStruggle: {TargetName} desperately struggles against {AttackerName}'s white stockings wrapped all around {TargetHisOrHer} limbs...
restraintStruggleCharmed: This is a restraint struggle with charm line, it shouldn't be possible to get both charmed and restrained, so report this to Kaa with a screenshot of game's message history, ideally.
restraintEscapedFail: But {TargetName} can't get free of {AttackerName}'s stretchy white stockings!
